mapper.insert: insert into d_board(d_title, d_content, target_amount,d_enddate, orgid) values(#{dTitle},#{dContent},#{targetAmount},#{dEnddate},#{orgid})
mapper.select: select * from d_board order by d_boardnum desc;
select * from d_board where d_boardnum=#{dBoardnum}
select * from d_board order by d_boardnum desc limit #{startrow}, #{amount}
select * from d_board where orgid=#{orgid} order by d_boardnum desc limit #{cri.startrow}, #{cri.amount}
select d_enddate from d_board where d_boardnum=#{dBoardnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE d_board b JOIN (SELECT d_boardnum, SUM(d_cost) as total_cost FROM d_payment WHERE d_boardnum = #{dBoardnum} GROUP BY d_boardnum) p ON b.d_boardnum = p.d_boardnum SET b.save_money = p.total_cost WHERE b.d_boardnum = #{dBoardnum}

select orgid from f_board where f_boardnum=#{fBoardnum}

SELECT f_boardnum, f_title, f_content, target_amount, save_money, f_regdate, f_enddate, orgid, (save_money / target_amount) * 100 AS participationRate FROM f_board ORDER BY participationRate DESC, f_boardnum DESC;
SELECT * FROM f_board ORDER BY save_money DESC, f_boardnum DESC;
SELECT * FROM f_board ORDER BY f_enddate ASC, f_boardnum DESC;
